title: Pixel 5 - How to change the way open apps are displayed? I hate the horizontal carousel
content:
I'd love to know if it's possible to switch from viewing your open apps as a horizontal carousel to maybe viewing them as a vertical list (like the Pixel 2 had) or a grid view.

Pretty much anything but a horizontal carousel would be awesome.

Is this possible with the Pixel 5? If so, how would I do it?

Thank you in advance!
